Articles.Content:
Question.. how do I get BobCats Orion to look like YANFRET's? I have both YANFRETS Orion and Bobscats Orion folders right here next to eachother. Now.. should I just swap out the entire folders? Im concerned there may be some conflicting issues with the IVA so id like to just move the textures over. Which files do I remove and replace? Bobcats files are different names so I don't know whats what.

Tl:dr.. can I just deleted Orion_pod from the American Pack and swap it out with Orion_pod from CMES? Will there be issues with the IVA? And are the part.cfg's any different between the two?

Question.. how do I get BobCats Orion to look like YANFRET's? I have both YANFRETS Orion and Bobscats Orion folders right here next to eachother. Now.. should I just swap out the entire folders? Im concerned there may be some conflicting issues with the IVA so id like to just move the textures over. Which files do I remove and replace? Bobcats files are different names so I don't know whats what.

Tl:dr.. can I just deleted Orion_pod from the American Pack and swap it out with Orion_pod from CMES? Will there be issues with the IVA? And are the part.cfg's any different between the two?

The IVA for Orion in the most current alpha is a stand-in and does not fit the capsule at all. We will be working on a bespoke IVA later, so you're not loosing anything by changing the IVA. If you want to just use the textures you can copy those over, however the Chaka version has other changes such as how the dock port fits, and that's pretty size specific.

Almost half way done with renovations!

Look! You can see the wire through which we communicate! omg

Only a million things left to do

Edited March 11, 2014 by YANFRET

I have a bit of a problem. Although all the chutes deploy correctly, icon goes green, all chutes pop out and fill, the capsule hits the water at about 40 M/S and kills the crew. I have set up a separate install of KSP with only CMES and KJR added, but still the same result.
You need to cut the drogue chute, or make sure it's cut.

You need to cut the drogue chute, or make sure it's cut.

Or he can go into the cfg file, take the first moduleParachute he finds, and move it down below the second parachute module. That should fix it. Keyword here is should.

Or he can go into the cfg file, take the first moduleParachute he finds, and move it down below the second parachute module. That should fix it. Keyword here is should.

Yes, that worked. The capsule hits the water at 4.7 M/S and the crew survives. However, it all looks a bit ugly. The main chutes deploy straight away, the drogue chute deploys later, then disappears and the chute icon in the staging sequence goes red. However, now that I have been pointed in the right direction I will start fiddling with the .cfg file and see if I can get things to work in a more aesthetically pleasing manner. So much to learn in this game!
On the Altair Descent Stage. The landing legs don't extend. Is they a fix for this?

Hello everyone!

You are not forgotten. Just got back from our K1 visa interview at the U.S. Embassy in Colombia ((Approved!! YAAY!!)) and now it's rush time to finish getting the house ready!! ( no time for Monkey Exploration just yet )

Here are some pictures from Bogota we took last week

Regards

PS: I purchased another copy of Kerbal as a gift for my coworker so he can share it with his son, and they are having a grand time making rockets explode.

Edited March 27, 2014 by YANFRET
Nice view

I've always wanted to visit Bogota

Edited March 28, 2014 by Motokid600

Dear YANFRET, a small question: how will the new parts affect the CMES project ?

I also hope your personal project is progressing fine

Dear YANFRET, a small question: how will the new parts affect the CMES project ?

I also hope your personal project is progressing fine

Hello thank you! It is and we're almost at the finish line : ) (IRL)

(CHAKA): It's exciting that they are doing that. I think moar rockets = good. It's possible that there is a part somewhere in the new release that makes sense to use with Chaka but without detailed research it's impossible to guess.

Monkey Asteroid Exploration?
ive run into a problem ive installed beta3 but the ships wont load in the vab says theres parts missing and mod admin shows this http://imgur.com/EgJ5a5Q

ive run into a problem ive installed beta3 but the ships wont load in the vab says theres parts missing and mod admin shows this http://imgur.com/EgJ5a5Q

I'm sorry to hear that you had a problem with alpha 003 but I'm glad you brought your experience to my attention. Would you mind trying it again with a fresh install of KSP and let me know if you get a different result?

Hello thank you! It is and we're almost at the finish line : ) (IRL)

(CHAKA): It's exciting that they are doing that. I think moar rockets = good. It's possible that there is a part somewhere in the new release that makes sense to use with Chaka but without detailed research it's impossible to guess.

Monkey Asteroid Exploration?

I was especially wondering if the new parts created in collaboration with the NASA (the extra-large fuel tanks and new engines) do not make the ones from the American Pack of BobCat being potentially a bit redundant ?

I was especially wondering if the new parts created in collaboration with the NASA (the extra-large fuel tanks and new engines) do not make the ones from the American Pack of BobCat being potentially a bit redundant ?

No the Chaka heavy lift system should continue on its development path from what you've seen and it will be up to the user to decide if it's redundant.

I'm very happy with how it works now, but it's always nice to have choices.

Edited April 4, 2014 by YANFRET

Ok, thanks for these explanations

And again, i'm waiting for future versions of it !

Ok, thanks for these explanations

And again, i'm waiting for future versions of it !

I will be quite pleased to get the next version to you guys and it will include the heavy lift systems.

By the way Monkey Exploration seems to work just fine in 23.5

Assuming you add Kerbal Joint Reinforcement, of course.
No matter how many times I search through this I have no idea what the heck this is supposed to be. What is it?

No matter how many times I search through this I have no idea what the heck this is supposed to be. What is it?

A magical system for avoiding chores

A magical system for avoiding chores

So it's the internet?

So it's the internet?

Anyway so this is a mod pack that provides bespoke systems for exploring space within the boundaries of proposals NASA has made.
